statements: UPDATE luxury_properties SET property_price = 1500000 WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE luxury_properties SET virtual_tour_link = 'https://example.com/virtualtour' WHERE property_name = 'Luxury Penthouse' AND virtual_reality_support = true;

UPDATE virtual_tours SET tour_rating = 4.5, tour_duration = 60 WHERE tour_id = 1;
